Moonworks:BlockedDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when blocking damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: What, did you just do something?

Moonworks:HomemarkTextContainer.NAME: Homemark Text
Moonworks:HomemarkTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when spending gold with the Homemark.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dang, I wanted to burn them.
I don't need this many of these.
These coins are nothing but a burden.
*sigh* What I want is war, not these stupid things.

Moonworks:KOTextContainer.NAME: KO Text
Moonworks:KOTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when defeated in battle.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No way... Why do I even exist?
I-I got defeated by a thing like that...
I had to win... I must always win!
